field.name: Content Column Width (in grids). Sum of two columns must be SMALLER than 12
left_width
field.label: width left
field.description: Width left column. Add values from 0 to 11 (ex. 0,1,2,3,4 etc.) You can disable this column by adding 0 value

field.name: right_width
field.label: width right
field.description: Width right column. Add values from 0 to 11 (ex. 0,1,2,3,4 etc.) You can disable this column by adding 0 value

field.name: Bottom Column Width (in grids). Sum of four columns must be EQUAL 12
bottom1_width
field.label: width bottom1
field.description: Width of module bottom1. Add values from 0 to 12 without coma (you can disable this column if you add 0 value). Example (3+3+3+3=12) or (2+4+3+3) etc.

field.name: bottom2_width
field.label: width bottom2
field.description: Width of module bottom2. Add values from 0 to 12 without coma (you can disable this column if you add 0 value). Example (6+6+0+0=12) or (0+3+9+0) etc.

field.name: bottom3_width
field.label: width bottom3
field.description: Width of module bottom3. Add values from 0 to 12 without coma (you can disable this column if you add 0 value). Example (12+0+0+0=12) or (6+0+0+6) etc.

field.name: bottom4_width
field.label: width bottom4
field.description: Width of module bottom4. Add values from 0 to 12 without coma (you can disable this column if you add 0 value). Example. (4+4+4+0=12) or (6+4+2+0) etc.
